Summary: Duplicate cache fpc for same page with same query
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly identifies and uses the same Full Page Cache (FPC) for pages with the same query parameters, regardless of their order or trailing characters. This prevents an unnecessary increase in the page cache folder size. Previously, the system would create a different FPC identifier for the same page if the order of the query parameters was different or if there were trailing characters, leading to an increase in the page cache folder size.

Summary: Missing indexing of required columns in catalog_product_entity_int table
Custom field (Release Note): Added the missing indexing of required columns in catalog_product_entity_int table

Summary: Compiling code of disabled module.
Custom field (Release Note): This pull request escapes disabled modules before code compilation.

Summary: Place Order is not working on Proceed to checkout via Negotiable Quote with PayFlow Pro Credit Card payment method
[Random Bug] Fotorama lib isn't loaded
Custom field (Release Note): The system now ensures that the Fotorama library is properly loaded, allowing all attached images to be displayed in the image gallery as expected. Previously, only the first image was visible due to an issue with the Fotorama library not loading correctly.

Summary: Lighthouse Accessibility failure
Custom field (Release Note): The System now Pass with Accessibility score of 100

Summary: Magento_Theme title.phtml template invalid for PHP 8.2
Custom field (Release Note): This pull request fixes an issue when CMS page created with the null heading as in Php 8.x passing null to trim() throws Exception: Deprecated Functionality: trim(): Passing null to parameter #1 ($string) of type string

Summary: Product Collection - addMediaGalleryData calls getSize when the collection maybe or will be loaded (Can use count to avoid an extra DB query)
Custom field (Release Note): This PR reduces the extra query call using count() if the product collection is already loaded when calling Product Graphql with media_gallery field included in it.

Summary: Putting csp_whitelist.xml in theme does not work and creates intermittent issue
Custom field (Release Note): Implemented caching of CSP whitelist per website area.

Summary: Magento 2.4.7 update (mini)cart no decimal qty allowed
Custom field (Release Note): Now Magento correctly handles when we are updating qty with decimals from mini cart when the locale was NL(Dutch)

Summary: [Issue] Copyedit: change "coping" to "copying"
Custom field (Release Note): PR fixes the Minor copyedit to correct spelling of "copying"

Summary: [Issue] Fix offline invoice capture (404)
Custom field (Release Note): It fixes the 404 Page Error while capturing invoices for offline payment methods from Magento admin

Summary: When using file storage for the lock provider, we get an ever growing directory of files without any cleanup happening
Custom field (Release Note):
This pull request introduce a new cron job that runs once per day and searches for lock files that haven't been modified in the last 24 hours and can thus be safely removed. This will keep the contents of the lock files directory under control.
This cron job will only execute something when the lock provider is configured to use files, not when one of the others is used (database - the default, zookeeper or cache)

Summary: Success message after Quote renaming vanishes intermittently
[Issue] Cleanup: don't use void return value from method calls.
Custom field (Release Note): This PR does minor cleanup. Sometimes we called methods that didn't return anything (void) and then used that result value. Which is really not needed.

Summary: Error: Script error for "Magento_Catalog/js/validate-product" for admin content pagebuilder with products load
Custom field (Release Note): This PR fixes the  Script error for catalogAddToCart when editing the pagebuilder with the products condition

Summary: [Issue] Update subtotal.phtml
Custom field (Release Note): The System updates the subtotal.phtml with the correct spacing

Summary: [Issue] Improve user experience with roles tree
Custom field (Release Note): This pull request adds buttons to collapse all, expand all, and expand branches with selected items. This functionality is similar to that provided in the category tree (Catalog -> Inventory -> Categories)

Summary: Block selection in widgets that have the same identifier
Custom field (Release Note): The System now correctly handles selecting block while creating widgets when we are having same identifier blocks

Summary: Not able to place the order with the guest
Disable captcha storefront config still load captcha js files
Custom field (Release Note): The System now does not load captcha js files when we disabled captcha for storefront

Summary: [Issue] [PHPDOC] Fix bad phpdoc for Magento\Framework\Message\ManagerInterface
Custom field (Release Note): This PR fixes the bad phpdoc for \Magento\Framework\Message\ManagerInterface and remove all duplicate phpdoc in \Magento\Framework\Message\Manager (use inheritdoc syntax).

Summary: B2B Login as Customer header still has Magento branding
Custom field (Release Note): Earlier the storefront header shows "You are now connected as <customer name> on <store name>" with Magento branding. Which is now fixed and the header shows with ADOBE branding.

Summary: Removed beta minimum-stability from composer.json
Custom field (Release Note): Removed beta minimum-stability from composer.json

Summary: Cannot return null for non-nullable field \"AppliedCoupon.code\" unexpected issue
[2.4.8] No callbacks found for cron job catalog_product_alert
Doucment should be updated for % implementation which is not correct in official document
Custom field (Release Note): Updated the devdoc for DHL Rest API support

Summary: Symfony\Component\Mime\Exception\LogicException: The "Sender" header must be an instance of "Symfony\Component\Mime\Header\MailboxHeader" (got "Symfony\Component\Mime\Header\MailboxListHeader")
Table prefix is not taken into account
[DHL]-Handle Optional Dimensions in Regular Size Settings and Price Variance Between REST and XML API Integrations
Tax amount isn't updated when gift wrapping removed from the cart
Provide a feature to mass-delete tax rates using the grid
Custom field (Release Note): Admin users can now simultaneously delete multiple tax rates from the Admin Tax Rates grid.  [GitHub-33399](https://github.com/magento/magento2/issues/33399)

Summary: Product page gives error because of url rewrites
Custom field (Release Note): Now the Product Page is loaded successfully when we have URL rewrites

Summary: Cart price rule with condition SKU dosen't take into account the "leading zeros" in the SKU (sku: 01234 is the same as 1234)
Custom field (Release Note): The System now correctly handles Cart price rule with condition SKU take into account the "leading zeros" in the SKU

Summary: Products graphql returned disabled categories in the category aggregations
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix disabled categories aren't returned for the products GraphQl request.

Summary: GraphQL Response for Order placement does not include the exception message
Custom field (Release Note): Reverted previous change that was returning errors in a different format. Now potential errors are returned in a consistent manner, not breaking GraphQL schema. This should be added as known BIC, approved by PM in ACP2E-3399

Summary: Slow query is executed when product widget is included via pagebuilder
Custom field (Release Note): The Query for product widgets creation including product SKUs is optimized.

Summary: Expired persistent quotes are not cleaned up by a cron job sales_clean_quotes
Custom field (Release Note): The expired persistent quotes are now cleared when the 'persistent_clear_expired' cron job runs. Previously, the expired persistent quotes were not cleared by any other cron job.

Summary: Product images not resized when added as configurable product
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, images added through Configurations in the admin panel did not adhere to the maximum upload size limit, which could lead to inconsistencies and management challenges. Now, a fix has been implemented to ensure that images are automatically resized during upload to comply with the maximum size limit, streamlining the process and maintaining system standards.

Summary: GraphQL Response for Order placement is partially localised
Custom field (Release Note): Errors returned by placeOrder GraphQl mutation were not fully localized. Now, in a multilanguage context, errors are properly translated.

Summary: [Cloud] Some Inline Javascript does not work after upgrade to magento 2.4.6-p7
Custom field (Release Note): Clicking on "delete" button in "Add to Order by SKU" in admin will now remove the SKU. Previously, clicking on"delete" button in "Add to Order by SKU" did not remove the SKU.

Summary: Issue with Default Attribute Option Value Behavior for Multiselect
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix default values for multiple options attribute were not being saved properly. Now, after the fix, the values are properly stored in the database.

Summary: [Cloud] Bug when adding products to category
Custom field (Release Note): The pagination and record count label now work correctly when adding products to a category via the popup grid. Previously, loading only a single page with items equal to the page size caused issues with the item selection dropdown.

Summary: indexer_update_all_views cron error with MAGE_INDEXER_THREADS_COUNT
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed issue for MAGE_INDEXER_THREADS_COUNT > 2 with Customer Segment indexer

Summary: Backend admin menu subtitles not displaying
Custom field (Release Note): All titles of the main menu groups will now be properly displayed. Previously, if the second or third column of the main menu contained only one group of links, the title of the group was not displayed.

Summary: "Something went wrong" error on checkout for inactive company
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, the logout action was not being completed properly on the cart page, if the logged in user company was no longer enabled. Now, if the company is no longer available, the logout is performed properly.

Summary: Async Bulk Operation remains in open state for async.magento.configurableproduct.api.optionrepositoryinterface.save.post
Custom field (Release Note): Bulk API endpoints will now throw an error if the request body is not an Array, thus requiring bulk item keys to be consecutive numbers starting from 0. Previously, bulk item status was not updated due to the arbitrary item key submitted in the bulk request.

Summary: Exception while adding "Conditions Combination" in Page Builder Products widget condition
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by adding a check to skip missing or incomplete conditions. Previously, this caused error logs to be generated due to the handling of incomplete conditions in the system.

Summary: Unable to upload image with relatively small width
Custom field (Release Note): The system no longer fails to resize image with relatively small width to its height.

Summary: Issue while moving the product qty to back to shopping cart from the admin
Custom field (Release Note): When creating an order from the admin, products in the customer cart on the sidebar will not disappear when added to the order.

Summary: [CLOUD] API REST bug on is_subscribed value not considering from the current store  using searchCriteria
Custom field (Release Note):
API REST Customer query fetches the correct "is_subscribed" value from the correct store using searchCriteria
Previously the API REST Customer query did not consider store when fetching is_subscribed" value.

Summary: Browser crash when loading attribute set
Custom field (Release Note): Browser no longer crashes on attribute set edit page if there are more than 4k product attributes

Summary: Addresses selection is not saved when we "Check Out with Multiple Addresses"
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix when canceling the multishipping option, the address was not preselected when reverting back to multshipping. Now, the default address is replaced with one of the selections made within the multishipping screen.

Summary: Weak Password Management
Custom field (Release Note): The admin user cannot be saved when using the same password. Previously, it was saved successfully without a proper validation.

Summary: Admin displays incorrect currency symbol on when creating return
Custom field (Release Note): In a multi-website setup with different currencies (EUR/USD/GBP), the return product selection page in admin is now displaying the correct currency symbol. Previously, it displayed the default currency symbol.

Summary: REST endpoint Product Import Json not validate the mandatory fields
Custom field (Release Note): Name field is now required when creating new products through the import process  (admin or API). Prior to the fix, you could have created new products without name, this would have broken the admin interface and created invalid products.

Summary: gift_cards serialized data is inconsistent in the sales_order table
Custom field (Release Note): gift_cards data in sales_order table is now serialized correctly. Previously, it was serialized every time the order was updated.

Summary: [Mainline] Cart Price rule is not respecting Multishipping
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the implementation of this correction, the cart price rule for multi-shipping products did not apply correctly when sub-select conditions were applied and free shipping was enabled. However, since the correction was applied, the cart price rule for multi-shipping carts now functions as intended.

Summary: [CLOUD] Product URL Rewrites Not Created for New Store: Go Live Blocker
Custom field (Release Note):
Product URL Rewrites for New Store is successfully created. 
Previously operation ended with memory leak or with timeout.

Summary: Previewing a scheduled update opens the first store view in alphabetical order instead of the store view of interest
Custom field (Release Note):
Previous to the fix, the preview of a scheduled update opened in the first store view in alphabetical order instead of the assigned store view.
After the fix, the preview now correctly opens in the store view assigned to the CMS block staging update.

Summary: allow_parallel_generation should be set through environment variable
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the "MAGENTO_DC_CACHE__ALLOW_PARALLEL_GENERATION" environment variable can be used to set the "allow_parallel_generation" configuration.

Summary: Staging_apply_version Cron behavior issue -  special_price ignored
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, quotes totals will be recalculated after changing special price by scheduled product update.

Summary: Exception while creating UPS shipping label
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed Warning: Array to string conversion during UPS shipping label creation

Summary: Action logs for content staging
Custom field (Release Note): The Action Logs now will show the Staging Update activities. Previously, the Staging Update log was not recorded in the Admin Action Logs.

Summary: Attribute Default Value for Options Not Working
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when we changed the default value of a product select attribute, it appeared as an array element with the previous values. After this fix is applied, when we update a product attribute value it will save as a single element at eav_attribute table.

Summary: Incorrect Gift Card Code URL in the email when purchased in from the secondary website
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the multi-store setup and gift card for non-default stores always redirected the gift card claim to the default website. After this fix is applied, the email will redirect the gift card claim link to the correct scope or website.

Summary: Gift Card validation fails when editing due to thousand separator
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed issue with gift card product type saving when the gift card amount is 1000 and more.

Summary: [Cloud] Changing table column type from Int to Decimal using db_schema.xml file In Magento 2 Results In Errors
Custom field (Release Note): Changing the column data type is not working correctly. Previously, it throws an error: The attribute 'identity' is not allowed.

Summary: Missing Website Filter Option in Export Process
Custom field (Release Note): It is now possible to filter products by websites when creating products export.

Summary: Category Permissions module possibly preventing caching
Custom field (Release Note): 3rd party controllers now cached correc tly with customer segments

Summary: The grand total calculation does not including the Tax amount
Custom field (Release Note): Order contains correct totals when places from existing Purchase Order with Cross Border Trade enabled.

Summary: Store Pickup not respecting maximum search radius when address is changed at checkout
Custom field (Release Note): Now pre-selected store in "Pick in Store" will update if the shipping address changes. Previously, once a store was pre-selected, it did not change even if the new shipping address is not within the radius of the selected store

Summary: Incorrect config path for remote storage path style configuration
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, setting the remote storage path style configuration will impact the actual AWS S3 path style configuration.

Summary: async.operations.all can create multiple entries for 1 SKU
Custom field (Release Note): Concurrent requests to save and update the same product are now serialized to prevent race conditions  which may result in data inconsistency or duplicated products

Summary: Duplicate of AC-13913 - Static attribute cleaning asynchronously.
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, there is no 'Undefined array key "apply_to"' error when numerous instances of the \Magento\CatalogImportExport\Model\Import\Product\Type\AbstractType are created.

Summary: Concurrent Calls to Reorder GraphQL API - Same Products Added to Different Rows
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where concurrent calls to the Reorder GraphQL API result in the same products being added as different rows, leading to data inconsistencies.

Summary: Exception "Cannot create rendition for media asset paths" during image insertion
Custom field (Release Note): After removing the values of the Maximum Width and Maximum Height of the Media Gallery Image Optimization configuration, the error is not occurred any more during the image optimization process.

Summary: updateCustomerEmail GraphQL mutation(Change email Address) doesn't trigger the email Notification
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, email was not sent to customers after successfully updating their email addresses on their accounts. After the fix has been applied, customers now receive email notifications after successfully updating their email addresses.

Summary: New currency (XCG) support in Adobe
Custom field (Release Note): Caribbean Guilder (XCG) is added to the currencies list.

Summary: [Cloud] Delete operation is forbidden for current area error during customer account creation
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix saving a customer with an invalid address returns a message describing the reason for invalidity instead of irrelevant "Delete operation is forbidden for current area".

Summary: Unassigning categories in a B2B shared catalog via the REST API is slow
Custom field (Release Note): Now the performance is significantly improved when unassigning categories in B2B. Previously, it took a long time to unassign categories in the B2B shared catalog.

Summary: Dynamic Attribute Not Updating in Gift Registry via updateGiftRegistry Mutation
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, before this fix through the updateGiftRegistry mutation, the custom attribute of the gift registry was not modified or updated through GraphQL mutations. After this fix has been applied, the dynamic attribute of the gift registry can successfully be updated through the updateGiftRegistry mutation.

Summary: Performance issue with new Setup Patch in B2B
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the performance issue where upgrading the Magento_Company module after updating to B2B 1.5.2 took an excessively long time when processing a large number of records (~100,000+) in the company_structure table.

Summary: [Packaging] Fix magento/magento-coding-standard dependency+ page-builder
